attributes.action: cancel the sham inquiry into the Iraq "war"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
please do not insult the public's intelligence by stating that this inquiry will be anything other than a cover-up for all concerned.

cancel this sham and do not waste our tax payers money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
